rules_text:
When Cursed Conquest enters the battlefield, create a 3/2 black and red Warrior creature token.
Whenever you attack with three or more creatures with power greater than their toughness, sacrifice Cursed Conquest. When you do, create a 6/3 black Spirit creature token with flying and “At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 3 life unless you sacrifice a creature” that's tapped and attacking.
